# The `GlobalOutlinedFunction` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The information necessary to create an outlined function that is matched globally. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Public Member Functions

### getOccurrenceCount() {#a8e17727ea30aa97903c1a0c5785ea444}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::outliner::GlobalOutlinedFunction::getOccurrenceCount () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Return the number of times that appear globally.

Global outlining candidate is uniquely created per each match, but this might be erased out when it&#39;s overlapped with the previous outlining instance.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoutliner-h/#l00292">292</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoutliner-h">MachineOutliner.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::outliner::GlobalOutlinedFunction::getOutliningCost () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Return the outlining cost using the global occurrence count with the same cost as the first (unique) candidate.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoutliner-h/#l00299">299</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoutliner-h">MachineOutliner.h</a>.
